email_body: use 380 From: Russell Dyk @ ENRON 11/01/2000 12:06 PM To: Brad McKay/HOU/ECT@ECT, John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Caroline Abramo/Corp/Enron@Enron cc: Subject: Credit Suisse First Boston CSFB informed us today that their Appalachia hedging deal will likely happen in the next two weeks. The deal, in short, involves Enron buying an average volume of 11,500 mmBtu/d at TCO and 5,500 mmBtu/d at CNG for 12 years and 1 month from Dec00. CSFB would like to get an idea of where the market is now. I've attached a spreadsheet that details the volumes, which decline with time. Could you please provide indicative prices, as of tonight's close. Thanks, Russ
